DataElement.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core 4 Last 24 Hours Severity Disturbed Sleep at its Worst Score 11 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the severity of disturbed sleep at the worst in the last 24 hours, using an eleven-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core Past 24 Hour Severity Disturbed Sleep at its Worst Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather._A question about an individual's disturbed sleep at its worst._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::24 Hour Severity Disturbed Sleep at its Worst Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:A question about an individual's disturbed sleep at its worst.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
A question about an individual's disturbed sleep at its worst.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.
